TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OleDbConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbConnectionStringBuilder Inherits DbConnectionStringBuilder

summary.span: 为创建和管理由 类使用的连接字符串的内容提供了一种简单方法。

span.span: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过连接字符串生成器，开发人员可以使用该类的属性和方法，以编程方式创建语法正确的连接字符串以及分析和重新生成现有的连接字符串。The connection string builder lets developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class. 连接字符串生成器提供了允许的 OLE DB 连接的已知的键/值对相对应的强类型化的属性和开发人员可以添加任意键/值对的任何其他连接字符串值。The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by OLE DB connections, and developers can add arbitrary key/value pairs for any other connection string values. 类实现 接口。The class implements the interface. 这意味着在设计时类适用于 Visual Studio.NET 设计器。This means that the class works with Visual Studio .NET designers at design time. 当开发人员使用设计器生成强类型化数据集和强类型化的连接 Visual Studio.NET 中时，强类型化的连接字符串生成器类将显示其类型与关联的属性，将具有的转换器的可以将映射为已知键列值。When developers use the designer to build strongly typed DataSets and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio .NET, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys. 需要在应用程序中创建连接字符串的开发人员可以使用 类生成和修改连接字符串。Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the class to build and modify connection strings. 使用该类还可以轻松管理存储在应用程序配置文件中的连接字符串。The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file. 仅的一组有限的已知的键/值对进行检查。The performs checks only for the limited set of known key/value pairs. 因此，此类可用于创建无效的连接字符串。Therefore, this class can be used to create invalid connection strings. 下表列出的已知的键和其对应的属性中类和其默认值。The following table lists the known keys and their corresponding properties within the class, and their default values. 除了这些特定的值，开发人员可以将任何键/值对添加到集合中包含实例：Besides these specific values, developers can add any key/value pairs to the collection that is contained within the instance: |键Key|PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |---------|--------------|-------------------| |文件名File Name||""""| |提供程序Provider||""""| |“数据源”Data Source||""""| |Persist Security InfoPersist Security Info||FalseFalse| |OLE DB 服务OLE DB Services||-13-13| 属性处理插入恶意项的尝试。The property handles attempts to insert malicious entries. 例如，下面的代码使用默认属性 （C# 中的索引器） 正确转义嵌套的键/值对：For example, the following code, using the default property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair: ```vb Dim builder As _ New System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Provider") = "Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0" builder("Data Source") = "C:\Sample.mdb" builder("User Id") = "Admin;NewValue=Bad" ``` ```csharp System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Provider"] = "Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0"; builder["Data Source"] = "C:\\Sample.mdb"; builder["User Id"] = "Admin;NewValue=Bad"; ``` 结果为以下连接字符串，该字符串以安全方式处理无效值：The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Data Source=C:\Sample.mdb;User ID="Admin;NewValue=Bad" ``` ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序生成多个 OLE DB 数据库的连接字符串。The following console application builds connection strings for several OLE DB databases. 首先，该示例创建 Microsoft Access 数据库的连接字符串，然后创建 IBM DB2 数据库的连接字符串。First, the example creates a connection string for a Microsoft Access database, and then creates a connection string for an IBM DB2 database. 该示例还分析现有的连接字符串，并演示了操作的连接字符串的内容的各种方法。The example also parses an existing connection string, and demonstrates various ways of manipulating the connection string's contents. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 所提供的连接字符串为实例的内部连接信息提供数据。

span.span: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性，直接 (通过设置属性) 或通过将连接字符串作为参数传递给构造函数，可能会影响集内包含的键/值对的实例。Setting the property, either directly (by setting the property) or by passing a connection string as a parameter to the constructor, may affect the set of key/value pairs that are contained within the instance. 设置属性设置为"sqloledb，"例如，添加所有的标准 SQL 连接字符串属性。Setting the property to "sqloledb," for example, adds all the standard SQL connection string properties. 请参阅有关此行为的演示本主题中的示例。See the example in this topic for a demonstration of this behavior. 对于某些提供程序，将分配在一个连接字符串中的构造函数将导致提供的键/值对的顺序重新排列数据。For some providers, assigning a connection string within the constructor causes the order of supplied key/value pairs to be rearranged. ## Examples 下面的示例创建多个情况下，将不同的连接字符串传递给每个用例中的构造函数。The following example creates multiple instances, passing a different connection string to the constructor in each case. 请注意如何设置与连接关联的提供程序更改的对象的集合中的预定义的键/值对集。Note how setting the provider associated with the connection changes the set of predefined key/value pairs within the object's collection. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Ctor/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 连接字符串的格式错误（可能是键/值对中缺少必需的“=”）。

span.span: The connection string is incorrectly formatted (perhaps missing the required "=" within a key/value pair).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Clear() cil managed

span.span: Clears the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法删除中的所有键/值对，并将所有相应的属性重置为其默认值。The method removes all key/value pairs from the , and resets all corresponding properties to their default values. 这包括将 属性设置为 0，并将 属性设置为空字符串。This includes setting the property to 0, and setting the property to an empty string. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了调用的效果方法。The following example demonstrates the effect of calling the method. 此示例用一些键/值对填充 ，然后调用 方法并显示结果。This example populates the with some key/value pairs, and then calls the method and shows the results. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Clear/VB/source.vb#1)]

returns.span: 如果 包含具有指定键的元素，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: true if the contains an element that has the specified key; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然设置属性可能会隐式填充相应的键/值对中的提供程序方法不返回`true`隐式提供的密钥。Although setting the property may implicitly fill in appropriate key/value pairs for the provider, the method does not return `true` for implicitly provided keys. 此方法返回`true`仅为显式提供的键。This method returns `true` only for explicitly provided keys. ## Examples 下面的示例创建实例，设置的某些属性，然后再尝试确定是否存在各种键在该对象中通过调用方法。The following example creates an instance, sets some of its properties, and then tries to determine whether various keys exist within the object by calling the method.

member this.DataSource : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要连接到的数据源的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data source to connect to.

value.span: 为 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在您尝试设置此属性时传入的值为 null，则将重置 属性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果未设置值，而开发人员尝试检索该属性的返回值是`String.Empty`。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 此属性对应于连接字符串内的"Data Source"键。This property corresponds to the "Data Source" key within the connection string. ## Examples 下面的示例控制台应用程序创建一个新实例，然后设置和属性。The following example console application creates a new instance, and then sets the and properties. 最后，该示例创建一个新实例，并使用该对象连接到所指示的数据存储。Finally, the example creates a new instance, and uses that object to connect to the indicated data store. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于连接到数据源的通用数据链接 (UDL) 文件的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the Universal Data Link (UDL) file for connecting to the data source.

value.span: 为 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在您尝试设置此属性时传入的值为 null，则将重置 属性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果未设置值，而开发人员尝试检索该属性的返回值是`String.Empty`。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 此属性对应于连接字符串内的"FileName"键。This property corresponds to the "FileName" key within the connection string. 设置此属性不会导致实例来读取引用的文件的内容，即使该文件存在且包含有效的连接信息。Setting this property does not cause the instance to read the contents of the referenced file, even if the file exists and contains valid connection information. 设置此属性不起作用而不以指示要连接到数据源时读取的文件。Setting this property has no effect other than to indicate the file to read when connecting to the data source.

summary.span: 获取或设置与指定的键关联的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value associated with the specified key.

summary.span: 在 C# 中，此属性为索引器。

span.span: In C#, this property is the indexer.

value.span: 与指定的键相关联的值。

span.span: The value associated with the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为设置属性可能会将对应的项添加到 （具体取决于特定的提供程序的行为） 的键/值对的集合，您可能能够检索您以前未显式设置的键的值。Because setting the property may add corresponding items to the collection of key/value pairs (depending on the behavior of the specific provider), you may be able to retrieve a value for a key you have not set explicitly. 有关示例，只要将属性为"sqloledb，"您可以检索"Workstation ID"值，即使你尚未设置它自己。For example, as soon as you have set the property to "sqloledb," you can retrieve the "Workstation ID" value even if you have not set it yourself. 请参阅本主题演示的示例。See the example in this topic for a demonstration. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性 （C# 中的索引器） 来检索和设置的键/值对集合中的值。The following example uses the property (the indexer, in C#) to retrieve and set values within the collection of key/value pairs. 请注意，设置提供程序，在这种情况下，还提供与所选提供程序相关联的所有键/值对的默认值。Note that setting the provider, in this case, also provides default values for all the key/value pairs associated with the selected provider. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Item/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Item/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的值的顺序未指定，但与 属性返回的 中的关联值顺序相同。The order of the values in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the returned by the property. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序示例新建一个 。The following console application example creates a new . 该代码循环访问显示键/值对的 属性返回的 。The code loops through the returned by the property displaying the key/value pairs. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int OleDbServices { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.OleDbServices : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要为连接字符串内的 OLE DB Services 键传递的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value to be passed for the OLE DB Services key within the connection string.

value.span: 返回与连接字符串内的 OLE DB Services 键对应的值。

span.span: Returns the value corresponding to the OLE DB Services key within the connection string.
By default, the value is -13.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接字符串内的 OLE DB Services 键定义的开发人员可以启用或禁用 OLE DB 服务的值的组合。The OLE DB Services key within the connection string defines a combination of values that let developers enable or disable OLE DB services. 属性包含 OLE DB 文档中所述的值的按位组合。The property contains a bitwise combination of values, described in the OLE DB documentation. 有关此属性的相应值的详细信息，请参阅 OLE DB 程序员参考，特别是，"重写提供程序服务默认值。"For more information about appropriate values for this property, see the OLE DB Programmer's Reference, in particular, "Overriding Provider Service Defaults." 此属性的默认值为-13。The default value for this property is -13. 这对应于资源池、 自动事务登记、 会话级别聚合和任何客户端游标引擎的请求。This corresponds to a request for resource pooling, automatic transaction enlistment, session-level aggregation, and no client cursor engine. ## Examples 以下示例适用于两种方式的属性。The following example works with the property in two ways. 首先，它直接为演示此操作对生成的连接字符串的影响的属性分配值。First, it assigns a value directly to the property, demonstrating the effect this action has on the resulting connection string. 然后，示例清除，并将分配包含 OLE DB Services 键的值的完整连接字符串。Then, the example clears the and assigns a complete connection string that contains a value for the OLE DB Services key. 此步骤演示了，从连接字符串设置值修改属性，以及。This step demonstrates that setting the value from the connection string modifies the property, as well. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.OleDbServices#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.OleDbServices/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.OleDbServices#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.OleDbServices/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Building Connection Strings
Working with Connection Strings

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PersistSecurityInfo { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PersistSecurityInfo : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示如果连接是打开的或者一直处于打开状态，那么安全敏感信息（如密码）是否作为连接的一部分返回。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether security-sensitive information, such as the password, is returned as part of the connection if the connection is open or has ever been in an open state.

value.span: 为 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于连接字符串内的"Persist Security Info"键。This property corresponds to the "Persist Security Info" key within the connection string. ## Examples 以下示例适用于两种方式的属性。The following example works with the property in two ways. 首先，它直接为演示此操作对生成的连接字符串的影响的属性分配值。First, it assigns a value directly to the property, demonstrating the effect this action has on the resulting connection string. 然后，示例清除，并将分配包含"Persist Security Info"键的值的完整连接字符串。Then, the example clears the and assigns a complete connection string that contains a value for the "Persist Security Info" key. 此步骤演示了，从连接字符串设置值修改属性，以及。This step demonstrates that setting the value from the connection string modifies the property, as well. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串包含与内部连接字符串关联的数据提供程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that contains the name of the data provider associated with the internal connection string.

value.span: 为 属性的值，或者，如果未提供任何值，则为 。

span.span: The value of the property, or if none has been supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在您尝试设置此属性时传入的值为 null，则将重置 属性。If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the property is reset. 如果未设置值，而开发人员尝试检索该属性的返回值是`String.Empty`。If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`. 此属性对应于连接字符串内的"Provider"键。This property corresponds to the "Provider" key within the connection string. 值设置`Provider`属性，直接 (通过设置属性) 或通过将连接字符串作为参数传递给构造函数，可能会影响集内包含的键/值对的实例。Setting the value of the `Provider` property, either directly (by setting the property) or by passing a connection string as a parameter to the constructor, may affect the set of key/value pairs that are contained within the instance. 设置属性设置为"sqloledb，"例如，添加所有的标准 SQL 连接字符串属性。Setting the property to "sqloledb," for example, adds all the standard SQL connection string properties. 请参阅有关此行为的演示本主题中的示例。See the example in this topic for a demonstration of this behavior. 对于某些提供程序，将分配在一个连接字符串中的构造函数将导致提供的键/值对的顺序重新排列数据。For some providers, assigning a connection string within the constructor causes the order of supplied key/value pairs to be rearranged. ## Examples 下面的示例创建多个情况下，将不同的连接字符串传递给每个用例中的构造函数。The following example creates multiple instances, passing a different connection string to the constructor in each case. 请注意如何设置与连接关联的提供程序更改的对象的集合中的预定义的键/值对集。Note how setting the provider associated with the connection changes the set of predefined key/value pairs within the object's collection. > [!NOTE] > 该示例包括一个密码以演示 如何使用连接字符串。This example includes a password to demonstrate how works with connection strings. 在您的应用程序中，建议使用 Windows 身份验证。In your applications, we recommend that you use Windows Authentication. 如果必须使用密码，请不要在你的应用程序中包括硬编码的密码。If you must use a password, do not include a hard-coded password in your application. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Provider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Provider/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Provider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.Provider/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Building Connection Strings
Working with Connection Strings

param.name: keyword
param.span: 要从此 中的连接字符串移除的键/值对中的键。

span.span: The key of the key/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this .

summary.span: 从 实例中移除具有指定的键的项。

span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the instance.

returns.span: 如果该键原本存在于连接字符串中但被移除，则为 ；如果连接字符串中不存在该键，则为 。

span.span: if the key existed within the connection string and was removed, if the key did not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为方法返回一个值，指示它是否成功，它不需要再尝试删除的键/值对中是否存在键查找实例。Because the method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not required to look for the existence of a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the instance. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，并演示的行为方法。The following example creates a and demonstrates the behavior of the method. MemberSignature.Value: public override bool TryGetValue (string keyword, out object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool TryGetValue(string keyword, [out] object& value) cil managed
Public Overrides Function TryGetValue (keyword As String, ByRef value As Object) As Boolean
public: override bool TryGetValue(System::String ^ keyword, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % value);

span.span: The key of the item to retrieve.

param.name: value
param.span: 与 keyword 相对应的值。

span.span: The value corresponding to keyword.

summary.span: 从 实例中检索与所提供的键对应的值。

span.span: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from the instance.

returns.span: 如果在连接字符串中找到 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if was found within the connection string; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许开发人员安全地从 中检索值，而无需验证提供的键名是否为有效的键名。The method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name. 因为不会引发异常时调用它，传入不存在的键，不需要检索其值之前查找键。Because does not raise an exception when you call it, passing in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value. 调用不存在的键会将值为 null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 中`value`参数。Calling with a nonexistent key will place the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的行为方法。The following example demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks OleDbConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue/VB/source.vb#1)]
